a.title: R0014480.JPG by Sigfrid Lundberg, on Flickr

div.p: Super-wide Heliar was the first M Mount lens I bought. I have used it extensively, in particular on my Olympus E-P2. When acquiring my current body, the Ricoh GXR M, it all of a sudden became more super wide than it used to. That, and my decision to buy the Zeiss Biogon T* 2,8/25 ZM, has made me less inclined to mount my Heliar.
